= Software stack (technologies used) =

Transfr would most likely not exist without the help of these great free and Open Source softwares and libraries:

|| [http://apache.org Apache Web Server] || Used to serve the application ||
|| [http://mysql.com MySQL Database] || A reliable relational database ||
|| [http://djangoproject.com Django Framework] || A web framework for perfectionist with deadlines ||
|| [http://jquery.com jQuery] || The best JavaScript framework ||
|| [http://ui.jquery.com jQuery UI] || jQuery Interface components ||
|| [http://brandonaaron.net/docs/livequery/ jQuery Livequery] || A jQuery plugin for easy AJAX ||
|| [http://code.google.com/p/jquery-utils/ jQuery Utils] || A packaged collection of useful jQuery plugins ||
|| [http://gnu.org/software/gettext/ Gettext] || A translation framework used to support multiple langues ||
|| [http://yaml.org/ YAML] || A structured file format ||
|| [http://json.org/ JSON] || A lightweight data-interchange format ||
|| [http://famfamfam.com Silk Icons] || A free icon set ||
|| [http://pinvoke.com Fugue Icons] || Another free icon set ||

== Features ideas ==

|| *Feature*   || *Description* ||
|| search      || search throught files and optionally accross folders ||
|| lightbox    || when preview is clicked a lightbox could show the image ||
|| themes      || support for themes ||
|| sendarchive || archive and email selected files ||
|| comments    || comments on files ||
|| quotas      || per user and global disk quotas ||
|| settings    || a settings page for quotas, themes, lightbox, etc.. ||
|| fileicons   || show visually representative file icons ||
|| tablesort   || allow per row sorting ||
